products.name: Frozen Green Peas
products.shortDescription: Premium quality frozen green peas, handpicked and quick-frozen to preserve their natural sweetness and nutritional value.
products.description: Our Frozen Green Peas are sourced from the finest farms in North India and processed using state-of-the-art IQF (Individual Quick Freezing) technology. This method ensures that each pea retains its natural color, texture, and nutritional value. These tender, sweet peas are perfect for traditional Indian dishes like matar paneer, pulao, samosas, and parathas. They're also excellent in pasta, soups, and salads.

packaging.type: Food-grade polyethylene bags with resealable zipper

storage.instructions: Keep frozen. Do not refreeze after thawing.

cookingTips: No need to thaw - add directly to your cooking
Cooking time: 5-7 minutes in boiling water
Can be used in curries, rice dishes, soups, and snacks
Perfect for matar paneer, aloo matar, and peas pulao

products.name: Frozen Sweet Corn
products.shortDescription: Golden sweet corn kernels frozen at peak freshness, naturally sweet and packed with nutrients.
products.description: Our Frozen Sweet Corn features premium quality corn kernels harvested at the peak of ripeness and immediately frozen to lock in their natural sweetness and nutritional goodness. Each kernel bursts with flavor and maintains its tender-crisp texture. Ideal for soups, salads, pasta, chaat, sandwiches, and traditional corn preparations. These versatile kernels add a touch of natural sweetness and vibrant color to any dish.

packaging.type: Moisture-proof food-grade packaging with easy-open seal

storage.instructions: Store in freezer. Once opened, reseal properly and use within 7 days.

cookingTips: Use directly from frozen - no thawing required
Boil for 3-5 minutes or microwave for 2-3 minutes
Perfect for corn chaat, soups, fried rice, and salads
Can be roasted or grilled for a smoky flavor
Excellent in Mexican and continental dishes

products.name: Frozen Mix Vegetables
products.shortDescription: A perfectly balanced blend of premium vegetables - peas, carrots, beans, and corn for ultimate convenience.
products.description: Our Frozen Mix Vegetables offer the perfect combination of nutrition and convenience. This thoughtfully curated blend includes garden-fresh green peas, crisp carrots, tender French beans, and sweet corn kernels - all selected at their prime and frozen using advanced technology. This versatile mix is your go-to solution for quick yet nutritious meals. Ideal for vegetable pulao, fried rice, pasta, noodles, curries, and Chinese preparations. Save time on washing, peeling, and chopping while ensuring your family gets balanced nutrition.

packaging.type: Triple-layer food-grade packaging with zip-lock facility

storage.instructions: Keep frozen at all times. Do not refreeze once thawed. Use directly from freezer.

cookingTips: Add directly to your cooking without thawing
Perfect for quick pulao, biryani, and fried rice
Ideal for vegetable curries and stir-fries
Great for Chinese dishes like manchurian and noodles
Can be pressure cooked or microwaved

categories.name: Vegetables
categories.description: Fresh frozen vegetables picked at peak ripeness and frozen to preserve nutrients
